Dear $UserName,
Your guest profile has been successfully added to the portal at "${__VirtualRootPath}":"${__VirtualRootPath}".
h3.Get started with your portal
# Edit your "profile":"$MyStaffLink" to add personal and contact details. # View and comment the content open available for all portal users in the "Community":"${__VirtualRootPath}/products/community/", "Projects":"${__VirtualRootPath}/products/projects/" modules. # Add and download files available for you in the "Documents":"${__VirtualRootPath}/products/files/" module. # Organize your schedule with the built-in "Calendar":"${__VirtualRootPath}/addons/calendar/". # Start "Talk":"${__VirtualRootPath}/addons/talk/" to chat with other portal users online.
$GreenButton
If you need help with your portal, we invite you to browse our "Help Center":"https://helpcenter.onlyoffice.com" or visit our "Forum":"http://cloud.onlyoffice.org".
Truly yours, ONLYOFFICE Team "www.onlyoffice.com":"http://onlyoffice.com/"

# Edit your "profile":"$MyStaffLink" to add personal and contact details. # Create, edit and organize "Documents":"${__VirtualRootPath}/products/files/". # Add your email account to "${LetterLogoTextTM} Mail":"${__VirtualRootPath}/addons/mail/". # Create "Projects":"${__VirtualRootPath}/products/projects/" and manage your workflow by adding milestones and tasks. # Manage your customer relations using "CRM":"${__VirtualRootPath}/products/crm/" module, identify priority contacts, track communication history and sales performance. # Use "Community":"${__VirtualRootPath}/products/community/" to start your blogs, forums, add events, share bookmarks. # Organize your work schedule with the built-in "Calendar":"${__VirtualRootPath}/addons/calendar/". # Start "Talk":"${__VirtualRootPath}/addons/talk/" to chat with your teammates online.

data.name: subject_invite
data.value: Invitation to Join ${LetterLogoTextTM} Portal

data.name: pattern_invite
data.value:
h1.Invitation to Join ${LetterLogoTextTM} Portal
Dear $UserDisplayName,
$__AuthorName has invited you to join ${LetterLogoTextTM} - your team's portal that would enchance internal cooperation. Your portal address is "${__VirtualRootPath}":"$InviteLink" (adding this link to your bookmarks is a good idea, you are most likely to get to use it a lot).
You can accept the invitation by following the link below, it is only valid for 7 days:
p=. "Click here to join the portal":"$InviteLink"

data.name: subject_join
data.value: Invitation to Join ${__VirtualRootPath} Portal

data.name: pattern_join
data.value:
h1.Invitation to Join "${__VirtualRootPath}":"$InviteLink" Portal
Hello,
You have requested to join the "${__VirtualRootPath}":"$InviteLink" portal at ${LetterLogoTextTM} - a platform for document and project management. Join the portal and start collaborating with your colleagues or friends right away.
To accept the invitation please enter your name and password following this link: p=. "Join Portal":"$InviteLink"
*Note*: this link is valid for 48 hours only. Please complete the operation within that period.
If you have any questions or need assistance please feel free to contact us at "support@onlyoffice.com":"mailto:support@onlyoffice.com"
Best regards, ONLYOFFICE™ Support Team "www.onlyoffice.com":"http://onlyoffice.com/"

"$__AuthorName":"$__AuthorUrl" has changed his/her profile details at the "${__VirtualRootPath}":"${__VirtualRootPath}" portal.
^You receive this email because you are an administrator of the "${__VirtualRootPath}":"${__VirtualRootPath}" portal. If you do not want to receive the notifications about profile updates, please manage your "subscription settings":"$RecipientSubscriptionConfigURL".^

data.value:
h1.What's New on "${__VirtualRootPath}":"${__VirtualRootPath}" Portal for $Date
#foreach($activity in $Activities)
h2.$activity.Key
#foreach($whatsNewActivity in $activity.Value) #foreach($b in $whatsNewActivity.BreadCrumbs) h3.$b #end "$whatsNewActivity.Title":"$whatsNewActivity.URL" *Author*: "$whatsNewActivity.UserName":"$whatsNewActivity.UserAbsoluteURL", $whatsNewActivity.Action: $whatsNewActivity.Date.ToShortTimeString()

data.name: pattern_backup_created
data.value:
h1."${__VirtualRootPath}":"${__VirtualRootPath}" Portal Backup Created
Dear $OwnerName,
A backup file containing data from your "${__VirtualRootPath}":"${__VirtualRootPath}" portal has been created.
To learn more on the backup/restore procedure please refer to our "How to Create and Restore the ${LetterLogoTextTM} Portal Backup":"https://help.onlyoffice.com/products/files/doceditor.aspx?fileid=3750480&doc=dXBNQXpvdFNtelNUOHlYSWFnZG92ZmIzUDdDa3ovbjM5bElvNjkzOTVPMD0_IjM3NTA0ODAi0" user guide.

Best regards, ONLYOFFICE™ Support Team "www.onlyoffice.com":"http://onlyoffice.com/"

data.name: subject_portal_deactivate
data.value: Deactivation of the ${__VirtualRootPath} Portal

data.name: pattern_portal_deactivate
data.value:
h1.Deactivation of the "${__VirtualRootPath}":"${__VirtualRootPath}" Portal
Dear $OwnerName,
You have requested a temporary deactivation of your "${__VirtualRootPath}":"${__VirtualRootPath}" portal. Please follow the link below to confirm the operation: p=. "Deactivate Portal":"$DeactivateUrl"
*Note*: this link is valid for 7 days only. Please complete the portal deactivation process within that period.
You can reactivate your portal any time by clicking the following link: p=. "Reactivate Portal":"$ActivateUrl" (this link has no time limit)
If you have any questions or need assistance please feel free to contact us at "support@onlyoffice.com":"mailto:support@onlyoffice.com"
Best regards, ONLYOFFICE™ Support Team "www.onlyoffice.com":"http://onlyoffice.com/"

data.name: subject_portal_delete
data.value: Deletion of the ${__VirtualRootPath} Portal

data.name: pattern_portal_delete
data.value:
h1.Deletion of the "${__VirtualRootPath}":"${__VirtualRootPath}" Portal
Dear $OwnerName,
You have requested to permanently delete your "${__VirtualRootPath}":"${__VirtualRootPath}" portal.
*Important! All the data stored on your portal, as well as your registration details will be lost and cannot be recovered.*
If you still want to delete your "${__VirtualRootPath}":"${__VirtualRootPath}" portal please follow the link below to confirm the operation: p=. "Delete Portal":"$DeleteUrl"
*Note*: this link is valid for 7 days only. Please complete the portal deletion process within that period.
If you have any questions or need assistance please feel free to contact us at "support@onlyoffice.com":"mailto:support@onlyoffice.com"
Best regards, ONLYOFFICE™ Support Team "www.onlyoffice.com":"http://onlyoffice.com/"

Dear $UserName,
You have just created the ${LetterLogoText} portal, your team's portal that would enhance internal cooperation. Your portal address is "${__VirtualRootPath}":"${__VirtualRootPath}" (adding this link to your bookmarks is a good idea, you are most likely to get to use it a lot). data.value:
Dear $UserName,
Thank you for checking out ${LetterLogoTextTM} service. Hope, everything's going fine. We just want to remind you that the trial period for your account at "${__VirtualRootPath}":"${__VirtualRootPath}" will be over in five days.
At the moment the number of active users at the portal is $ActiveUsers.
If you're not going to increase it considerably, we can recommend you a $$Price/$PricePeriod plan.
Please, check all the available options and choose the most suitable rate for your business.
$GreenButton
$BlueButton
Truly yours, ONLYOFFICE Team "www.onlyoffice.com":"http://onlyoffice.com/"

data.name: pattern_after_creation2
data.value:
Email is still the best and most popular way to communicate with customers and partners. Every day we receive a great amount of messages using multiple email accounts from different services and it may seem impossible not to miss anything important.
Make use of these 5 tips and tricks to get organized and improve your email experience: $TableItemsTop $TableItem1 $TableItem2 $TableItem3 $TableItem4 $TableItem5 $TableItemsBtm $GreenButton
Still not yet configured the mail server using your own domain name? - Follow the instructions "here":"https://helpcenter.onlyoffice.com/ru/gettingstarted/mail.aspx#MailServer_block". If you need help with your portal, we invite you to browse our "Help Center":"https://helpcenter.onlyoffice.com" or visit our "Forum":"http://cloud.onlyoffice.org".
Truly yours, ONLYOFFICE Team "www.onlyoffice.com":"http://onlyoffice.com/"

data.name: pattern_after_creation3
data.value:
Dear $UserName,
Sometimes the most useful tools are not the most obvious. There is always much to be discovered, so we do our best to guide you through the every single corner of your cloud office.
Here is the Top 5 ${LetterLogoText} CRM features which you might have missed:
*Our goal is to transfer all of your paperwork to the cloud*
These 5 tips will move you closer to the aim: $TableItemsTop $TableItem1 $TableItem2 $TableItem3 $TableItem4 $TableItem5 $TableItemsBtm $GreenButton
If you need help with your portal, we invite you to browse our "Help Center":"https://helpcenter.onlyoffice.com" or visit our "Forum":"http://cloud.onlyoffice.org".
Truly yours, ONLYOFFICE Team "www.onlyoffice.com":"http://onlyoffice.com/"

data.value: 5 Tips to Improve Your Mail Experience

data.name: subject_after_creation3
data.value: Features You Might Have Missed in ${LetterLogoText} CRM

data.name: pattern_after_creation4
data.value:
Dear $UserName,
With ${LetterLogoText} you have all your data stored in one place available from the cloud. There is no more need for additional desktop software or flash drives. Be productive and access your office at "${__VirtualRootPath}":"${__VirtualRootPath}" from anywhere!
Start your migration to the cloud office with these 5 steps: $TableItemsTop $TableItem1 $TableItem2 $TableItem3 $TableItem4 $TableItem5 $TableItemsBtm
$GreenButton
If you need help with your portal, we invite you to browse our "Help Center":"https://helpcenter.onlyoffice.com" or visit our "Forum":"http://cloud.onlyoffice.org".
Truly yours, ONLYOFFICE Team "www.onlyoffice.com":"http://onlyoffice.com/"

The cloud office for your team is already created at "${__VirtualRootPath}":"${__VirtualRootPath}". It's time to invite your teammates to join it. The easiest way to do that is to distribute the invitation link using the *Invite users to portal* option.
$GreenButton
If you have access to the detailed contact information of the people, add your teammates manually one by one using the *Create New...* button in the *People* module. "Learn more >>":"http://helpcenter.onlyoffice.com/gettingstarted/people.aspx#AddingUsers_block"
Or add users all at once from: "your Yahoo or Google account":"http://helpcenter.onlyoffice.com/administratorguides/import-contacts-from-web.aspx", "your mail client address book":"http://helpcenter.onlyoffice.com/administratorguides/import-contacts-from-mail-client.aspx", "a CSV file":"http://helpcenter.onlyoffice.com/administratorguides/import-contacts-from-csv.aspx".
Finally, you can allow your teammates self-registration configuring the *Trusted Mail Domain* settings. "Learn more >>":"http://helpcenter.onlyoffice.com/gettingstarted/configuration.aspx#TrustedDomain"
Once added, manage their access rights. For more information about ARM, visit our "Help Center":"https://helpcenter.onlyoffice.com".
Truly yours, ONLYOFFICE Team "www.onlyoffice.com":"http://onlyoffice.com/"

data.name: pattern_after_registration_personal1
data.value:
$HeaderStart Welcome to ${LetterLogoText} Personal $HeaderEnd
You have just created your personal office in the cloud.
It's a desktopless workspace available in your browser, where you can store documents, work with them anywhere providing access to your friends or colleagues.
$FrameStart ${LetterLogoText} is compatible with Microsoft Office™ document formats. We promise to relieve you from formatting fidelity headache. $FrameEnd
$StrongStart Here are the basic features for a quick start: $StrongEnd
$MarkerStart Upload files from your computer or create new. $MarkerEnd
$MarkerStart Edit *.docx*, *.xlsx* and *.pptx* documents online. $MarkerEnd
$MarkerStart Download files in any popular format. $MarkerEnd
$SignatureStart Have a good start!
Sincerely, ONLYOFFICE team $SignatureEnd

data.name: pattern_after_registration_personal14
data.value:
$HeaderStart A few tips for freelance work $HeaderEnd
${LetterLogoTextTM} provides a good number of features for freelance community whether you are a contractor or hiring somebody for a project. Let's see what might be of the most interest for you:
$MarkerStart Read Only/Full Access files sharing $MarkerEnd
$MarkerStart Realtime collaborative editing and commenting $MarkerEnd
$MarkerStart Version & revision control $MarkerEnd
There is no need to download files and send them via email. Simply share them from your cloud office and collaborate wherever you are.
$StrongStart Need more collaborative functionality? $StrongEnd
${LetterLogoText} business edition is free for a 30 day trial period and provides you with even more opportunities for freelance or distant work. For instance, you can create and submit invoices to your clients. Would like to learn more? Proceed to our "CRM overview":"http://www.onlyoffice.com/crm.aspx".
$SignatureStart Sincerely, ONLYOFFICE team $SignatureEnd

data.name: pattern_after_registration_personal21
data.value:
$HeaderStart Give a try to ${LetterLogoText} for teams $HeaderEnd
In case you need to collaborate with a team or manage a project, we offer you to try the business edition of ${LetterLogoText}. In addition to the online editors and document management features, you'll be able to:
$MarkerStart control tasks and use Gantt chart in the Project Management module; $MarkerEnd
$MarkerStart track sales, relations with customers and create invoices in CRM; $MarkerEnd
$MarkerStart manage all your email accounts in one Email aggregator $MarkerEnd
and do many other operations that aim at creating a single collaborative work space and your teammates. See details "here":"http://www.onlyoffice.com/highlights.aspx".
For a start you can create a trial account that is free for 30 days. It doesn't have any functional restrictions.
$SignatureStart Sincerely, ONLYOFFICE team $SignatureEnd

data.name: pattern_after_registration_personal7
data.value:
$HeaderStart Connect your favorite cloud storage to ${LetterLogoTextTM} $HeaderEnd
It has been a week since you created your cloud office, so we believe it's time to unveil some beneficial features you might have missed.
$FrameStart Connect Dropbox, Google Drive, Box or OneDrive cloud storage to ${LetterLogoText} and create a single workspace for all your documents. You'll be able to edit external files by means of ${LetterLogoText} without any additional downloads. See details how to do it "here":"http://helpcenter.onlyoffice.com/tipstricks/add-resource.aspx". $FrameEnd
$StrongStart Need more document management options? $StrongEnd
Our "business edition":"http://www.onlyoffice.com/" is free for a 30 day trial period and provides extended document management opportunities together with a business toolset:
$MarkerStart Project documentation tracking. $MarkerEnd
$MarkerStart Close integration with CRM and Email. $MarkerEnd
$MarkerStart Individual and group sharing. $MarkerEnd
Interested? Learn more about "${LetterLogoTextTM} for business":"http://www.onlyoffice.com/document-management.aspx".
$SignatureStart Sincerely, ONLYOFFICE team $SignatureEnd

data.name: ItemFeatureProjectDiscussionsText
data.value: Discuss issues - any sort of problems and outstanding questions that occur - with your team to find a better solution together.

data.name: ItemFeatureTalk

data.name: ItemFeatureTalkText

data.name: ItemLinkWithProjects

data.name: ItemLinkWithProjectsText
data.value: Working on an opportunity might require the involvement of the whole team of the specialists. Create a project and link it with the opportunity to coordinate the work more efficiently.

data.name: ItemMailIntegration

data.name: pattern_after_creation2_enterprise
data.value:
Email is still the best and most popular way to communicate with customers and partners. Every day we receive a great amount of messages using multiple email accounts from different services and it may seem impossible not to miss anything important.
Make use of these 5 tips and tricks to get organized and improve your email experience: $TableItemsTop $TableItem1 $TableItem2 $TableItem3 $TableItem4 $TableItem5 $TableItemsBtm $GreenButton
Still not yet configured the mail server using your own domain name? - Follow the instructions "here":"https://helpcenter.onlyoffice.com/ru/gettingstarted/mail.aspx#MailServer_block". If you need help with your portal, we invite you to browse our "Help Center":"https://helpcenter.onlyoffice.com".
Truly yours, ONLYOFFICE Team "www.onlyoffice.com":"http://onlyoffice.com/"

data.name: pattern_after_creation3_enterprise
data.value:
Dear $UserName,
Sometimes the most useful tools are not the most obvious. There is always much to be discovered, so we do our best to guide you through the every single corner of your cloud office.
Here is the Top 5 ${LetterLogoText} CRM features which you might have missed:
*Our goal is to transfer all of your paperwork to the cloud*
These 5 tips will move you closer to the aim: $TableItemsTop $TableItem1 $TableItem2 $TableItem3 $TableItem4 $TableItem5 $TableItemsBtm $GreenButton
If you need help with your portal, we invite you to browse our "Help Center":"https://helpcenter.onlyoffice.com".
Truly yours, ONLYOFFICE Team "www.onlyoffice.com":"http://onlyoffice.com/"

data.name: pattern_after_creation4_enterprise
data.value:
Dear $UserName,
With ${LetterLogoText} you have all your data stored in one place. There is no more need for additional desktop software or flash drives. Be productive and access your office at "${__VirtualRootPath}":"${__VirtualRootPath}" from anywhere!
Start your migration to the cloud office with these 5 steps: $TableItemsTop $TableItem1 $TableItem2 $TableItem3 $TableItem4 $TableItem5 $TableItemsBtm
$GreenButton
If you need help with your portal, we invite you to browse our "Help Center":"https://helpcenter.onlyoffice.com".
Truly yours, ONLYOFFICE Team "www.onlyoffice.com":"http://onlyoffice.com/"

data.name: pattern_after_creation6_enterprise
data.value:
Dear $UserName,
In almost every business are we are to deal with documents every day - contracts, reports, white papers, invoices, etc. - and waste a lot of time moving it around. To help you work more efficiently and reduce time and efforts spent on paperwork, make use of these 5 simple tips and tricks.
$TableItemsTop $TableItem1 $TableItem2 $TableItem3 $TableItem4 $TableItem5 $TableItemsBtm $GreenButton
If you need help with your portal, we invite you to browse our "Help Center":"https://helpcenter.onlyoffice.com".
Truly yours, ONLYOFFICE Team "www.onlyoffice.com":"http://onlyoffice.com/"

data.name: pattern_after_creation8_enterprise
data.value:
Dear $UserName,
The cloud office for your team is already created at "${__VirtualRootPath}":"${__VirtualRootPath}". It's time to invite your teammates to join it. The easiest way to do that is to distribute the invitation link using the *Invite users to portal* option.
$GreenButton
If you have access to the detailed contact information of the people, add your teammates manually one by one using the *Create New...* button in the *People* module. "Learn more >>":"http://helpcenter.onlyoffice.com/gettingstarted/people.aspx#AddingUsers_block"
Or add users all at once from: "your LDAP database":"http://helpcenter.onlyoffice.com/ru/server/windows/community/ldap-settings.aspx", "your Yahoo or Google account":"http://helpcenter.onlyoffice.com/administratorguides/import-contacts-from-web.aspx", "your mail client address book":"http://helpcenter.onlyoffice.com/administratorguides/import-contacts-from-mail-client.aspx", "a CSV file":"http://helpcenter.onlyoffice.com/administratorguides/import-contacts-from-csv.aspx".
Once added, manage their access rights. For more information about ARM, visit our "Help Center":"https://helpcenter.onlyoffice.com".
Truly yours, ONLYOFFICE Team "www.onlyoffice.com":"http://onlyoffice.com/"

data.name: ItemAdjustRegionalSettings
data.value: Tip #2: Adjust the regional settings

data.name: ItemAdjustRegionalSettingsText
data.value: Choose the language for your web-office interface and set the correct time zone. It's particularly important for the notifications and the correct calendar work. Go to Settings >> Common >> Customization.

data.name: ItemBrandYourWebOffice
data.value: Tip #1: Brand your web-office

data.name: ItemBrandYourWebOfficeText
data.value: Change the portal logo settings following Settings >> Common >> White Label and uploading your company's logos of the specified sizes. To change the default portal title displayed on the Welcome page, go to Settings >> Common >> Customization >> Welcome Page Settings.

data.name: ItemCustomizeWebOfficeInterface
data.value: Tip #3: Customize your web-office interface

data.name: ItemCustomizeWebOfficeInterfaceText
data.value: Name the portal groups, its members and their activities following Settings >> Common >> Customization >> Team Template. Select the color theme that best suits your company brand.

data.name: ItemModulesAndTools
data.value: Tip #4: Select the ${LetterLogoText} modules and tools

data.name: ItemModulesAndToolsText
data.value: ${LetterLogoText} provides you with a complete set of tools for office collaboration allowing you to enable those you need for your work following Settings >> Common >> Modules & Tools. The disabled ones will be hidden.

data.name: ItemSecureAccess
data.value: Tip #5: Secure the access to your web-office

data.name: ItemSecureAccessText
data.value: ${LetterLogoText} portals are hosted on Amazon Web Services, which is one of the most well-established cloud computing platform today. But you can always make use of an extra security level by enabling the confirmation SMS code option. Go to Settings >> Security >> Portal Access
